item.title: Unable to Activate New Programmable Wireless SIMs
item.content:encoded:
Feb 21, 07:23 PST
Resolved - All SIMs that were affected by this incident and could not be reactivated from status "deactivated" are now in status "active". Customers that issued a request to activate new SIMs may need to issue the request again since many of those requests were aborted after a day. The incident is now resolved, and the service is operating normally at this time

Feb 21, 05:19 PST
Update - We are continuing to see recovery, with SIMs successfully activating. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 21, 03:19 PST
Update - We are continuing to see recovery, with SIMs successfully activating. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 21, 02:50 PST
